contents.text: Welcome to Betterworks Peninsula, where we empower your team's success through continuous performance management.
To get help setting and managing your OKRs, press 1.
To schedule an OKR planning session with our experts, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our OKR planning experts.

navigationGoals: Schedule a session with OKR planning experts
Schedule an OKR planning session to set clear mission-style objectives for my new team
I want to schedule a deep-dive OKR planning workshop with your expert consultants.
I need help scheduling an OKR planning session to define my team's goals.
I want to book a planning session to structure my team’s OKRs for the upcoming quarter.

contents.text: To review your current objectives and key results, press 2.
One moment please, connecting you to an OKR review specialist.

navigationGoals: Review my team’s current OKRs with a specialist
Review my current OKRs with a specialist to ensure I'm tracking progress correctly
I need a technical audit of my existing OKRs and feedback on optimization.
I want to review my current objectives and key results with a specialist.
I’d like to review and refine our existing OKRs with a specialist.

contents.text: To discuss employee engagement and development programs, press 2.
To speak with an employee engagement specialist, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to an employee engagement specialist.

navigationGoals: Get advice on boosting employee engagement
Speak with an engagement specialist about boosting team morale and cohesion
I’d like to analyze our employee engagement metrics and discuss pulse-survey strategies.
I need advice on improving my team's engagement and morale.
I’m looking for guidance on improving my team’s engagement strategies.

contents.text: To learn about our employee development solutions, press 2.
One moment please, connecting you to our employee development team.

navigationGoals: Learn about available employee development and training solutions
Learn about development programs to build my civilian leadership skills
I want to explore skill-gap analysis tools and design a customized development curriculum.
I want information on employee development and training programs.
I need information on employee development programs to support my team’s skill growth.
